channel.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
channel.description:
Haters gonna hate, but...
[url]https://www.moddb.com/events/2010-mod-of-the-year-awards/features/players-choice-upcoming-modification-2010[/url] [quote] [i]Is any explanation required? Without a SHADOW of a doubt, Black Mesa is the most hotly anticipated mod we have ever seen. The team may not update often, but when they do they stir up a frenzy and there is little doubt why. 2010 saw no release maybe just maybe 2011?[/i] [/quote] Well done Black Mesa!

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I don’t want a preview video of Inbound, to be honest. I’m quite satisfied with the amount of media that’s been released and I think more will just lead to spoiling, and I don’t want to see “Inbound” until I’m actually playing. A preview video of Inbound would be equivalent to sneaking a look at your Christmas presents before Christmas morning.

Read full topic
item.source: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
item.dc:creator: Cellander
item.description:
First of all congrats for the honorable mention.

DiePoente:

Wouldn’t it be funny, if the devs release it in the following week? :retard:

What a release it would have been. :awesome:

item.source: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Conti:

Well -1 for me, to say the truth.

The first time I saw Inbound in HL it made me amazed. At that time (1999) I never seen a game with so much detail, and the ride through the Black Mesa Research Facility was a big surprise. I repeated the ride many times in a row to catch all the details I didn’t see in the previous ride.
I want to have the same feeling now, with the “New Ibound” ride, and a video of it could spoil everything.

Don’t watch it?

Read full topic
item.source: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)

item.description:
Timmeh2k9:

+1 Vote from me!

I mean, it isn’t giving away too much is it?

Well -1 for me, to say the truth.

The first time I saw Inbound in HL it made me amazed. At that time (1999) I never seen a game with so much detail, and the ride through the Black Mesa Research Facility was a big surprise. I repeated the ride many times in a row to catch all the details I didn’t see in the previous ride.
I want to have the same feeling now, with the “New Ibound” ride, and a video of it could spoil everything.

item.title: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Haters gonna hate, but…

https://www.moddb.com/events/2010-mod-of-the-year-awards/features/players-choice-upcoming-modification-2010

Is any explanation required? Without a SHADOW of a doubt, Black Mesa is the most hotly anticipated mod we have ever seen. The team may not update often, but when they do they stir up a frenzy and there is little doubt why. 2010 saw no release maybe just maybe 2011?

Well done Black Mesa!

Read full topic
item.source: Mod of the Year 2010 - Player's Choice Upcoming Mod (Honorable Mention)
